stimulusHtml: Assume that the required reserve ratio is 10 percent and the banking system has limited reserves. If the central bank buys $1,000 of bonds from commercial banks, which of the following will occur?
choicesHtml: The money supply will increase by a maximum of $1,000.
There will be a maximum of $9,000 of new loans made by all banks.
Demand deposits will increase by a maximum of $9,000.
The amount of new cash reserves injected into the banking system will be $100.
The money supply will increase by a maximum of $10,000.
